price: Bã su yin ĩmãni da shi,(4( kuma haƙĩƙa, hanyar mutãnen farko ta shige.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes: * Annabi, tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi. Hanyar mutãnen farko ta ƙaryata Manzanni har a lõkacin da Allah zai halaka su da azãbarsa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi waqad khalat sunnatu al-awalīna
